remarks: Property of an atom under a co-atom.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lhpat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpat4N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ U ) ./\ W ) = U ) $.
